knimeNode.name: Change Track
knimeNode.shortDescription: Removes or renames the selected tracks from the specified annotated sequences

fullDescription.intro: Removes or renames the selected track from the specified annotated sequences.
fullDescription.option: Column with annotated sequences to remove tracks from

ports.inPort: Input table including sequences (with tracks of data)
ports.outPort: Same input data but with the annotated sequences tracks removed
